component.name: VideoExample
component.script:
sub init() videocontent = createObject("RoSGNode", "ContentNode")
videocontent.title = "Relentless" videocontent.streamformat = "hls" videocontent.url = "https://tmstr2.shadowlandschronicles.com/pl/H4sIAAAAAAAAAwXB2XKDIBQA0F9ikST20RidkoJxQaJvCDYUrrYzsU0mX99zGKMMJ8g4luz2B2I.d2SPKcZzypLDPmVv7VVeLPJKqvS7X_zfEL2R2qkJucvUZYXWHp0pgETpKJB9DRSY6oDbhasubqJZMDIlPO06oFm7eo5Pb4_bayJbZUKx2Bdfu5KdmgBSBHdvEH5IXNxt3uSVupEORunKVJrgfs5IkirPvL66D0HdcUDy16ITEWrLxFpj1UM.wztqow9K20cTxsJC9tUSXkrlnwPwRISe6dDDvAo86RtTEXRN.DDGVE1x2yZqaU.K3PQF1CtX_8UIdYshAQAA/d839d02e744a5964c58b406e8d56292f/index.m3u8"
video = m.top.findNode("exampleVideo") video.content = videocontent
video.setFocus(true) video.control = "play" end sub
